text:
[Verse]
Raindrops falling from the sky
Feel the rhythm as they fly
Puddles mirror city lights
Dancing
Swaying through the night

[Verse 2]
Feet are splashing left and right
Moon and stars our guiding light
Every step
A new delight
Let's just dance till morning bright

[Chorus]
Keep on moving
Don't hold back
In the rain
There's no lack
Let the storm be our track
Eyes on me
Follow my act

[Verse 3]
Thunder's beating like a drum
Heartbeat racing
Feel the hum
Flash of lightning
Here we come
In this rain
We'll overcome

[Verse 4]
Clothes are soaked
But we don't mind
Every raindrop feels so kind
Lost in rhythm
We unwind
In the rain
Love's what we find

[Bridge]
Close your eyes and drift away
In this moment
Let's just stay
Rain can't wash our joy away
Side by side
Come what may
title: Dancing in the Rain
